languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, срочное сообщение! Блюстители задержали опасного диверсанта, пытавшегося проникнуть на мостик. Я полагаю, что это... стоит вашего внимания. И сам диверсант, и обстоятельства его поимки довольно необычны". {n}Голос Вигдис звучит странно — не то озадаченно, не то взволнованно.{/n}

"Lord Captain, an urgent message! Our enforcers have arrested a dangerous saboteur who attempted to gain entry onto the bridge. This incident... may be worthy of your attention. You see, both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}You cannot tell if Vigdis sounds baffled or worried.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, срочное сообщение! Блюстители задержали опасного диверсанта, пытавшегося проникнуть на мостик. Я полагаю, что это... стоит вашего внимания. И сам диверсант, и обстоятельства его поимки довольно необычны". {n}Голос Вигдис звучит странно — не то озадаченно, не то взволнованно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent message! Guardians captured a dangerous saboteur who tried to intrude the bridge. I suppose this is... worth your attention. Both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}Vigdis's voice sounds in an unusual way, seemingly baffled or worried.{/n}

"Lord Captain, an urgent message! Guardians captured a dangerous saboteur who tried to intrude the bridge. I suppose this is... worth your attention. Both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}Vigdis's voice sounds in an unusual way, seemingly baffled or worried.{/n}

"Lord Captain, an urgent message! Our guardians have captured a dangerous saboteur who tried to intrude into the bridge. I presumed this... worthy of your attention. Both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}Vigdis doesn't sound herself, seemingly baffled or worried.{/n}

"Lord Captain, an urgent message! Our guardians have captured a dangerous saboteur who tried to intrude into the bridge. I presumed this... worthy of your attention. Both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}Vigdis doesn't sound herself, seemingly baffled or worried.{/n}

"Lord Captain, an urgent message! Our enforcers have arrested a dangerous saboteur who attempted to gain entry onto the bridge. This incident... may be worthy of your attention. You see, both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}You cannot tell if Vigdis sounds baffled or worried.{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人，收到了紧急消息！我们的执法者抓住了危险分子，这个人企图闯入舰桥。这件事情……或许值得您特别关注，因为无论是这个危险分子本身，还有他被捕时的情形，都相当不同寻常。”{n}维格迪斯的声音听起来不太对劲，你判断不出是出于困惑还是担忧。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent message! Our enforcers have arrested a dangerous saboteur who attempted to gain entry onto the bridge. This incident... may be worthy of your attention. You see, both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}You cannot tell if Vigdis sounds baffled or worried.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，收到了紧急消息！我们的执法者抓住了危险分子，这个人企图闯入舰桥。这件事情……或许值得您特别关注，因为无论是这个危险分子本身，还有他被捕时的情形，都相当不同寻常。”{n}维格迪斯的声音听起来不太对劲，你判断不出是出于困惑还是担忧。{/n}

languages.text: « Un message urgent, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nos prévôts ont capturé un dangereux saboteur qui tentait de s'introduire sur la passerelle. Cet... incident mérite sans doute votre attention, tant l'individu en question et les circonstances de son arrestation sont étranges. » {n}Vous ne sauriez dire si Vigdis est simplement perplexe ou bien véritablement inquiète.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent message! Our enforcers have arrested a dangerous saboteur who attempted to gain entry onto the bridge. This incident... may be worthy of your attention. You see, both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}You cannot tell if Vigdis sounds baffled or worried.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Un message urgent, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nos prévôts ont capturé un dangereux saboteur qui tentait de s'introduire sur la passerelle. Cet... incident mérite sans doute votre attention, tant l'individu en question et les circonstances de son arrestation sont étranges. » {n}Vous ne sauriez dire si Vigdis est simplement perplexe ou bien véritablement inquiète.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Captain, eine dringende Nachricht! Unsere Enforcers haben einen gefährlichen Saboteur verhaftet, der versucht hat, sich Zugang zur Brücke zu verschaffen. Dieser Zwischenfall ... ist Eurer Aufmerksamkeit womöglich würdig. Ihr müsst wissen: Der Saboteur als auch die Umstände seiner Gefangennahme wirken ziemlich sonderbar." {n}Du weißt nicht, ob Vigdis verblüfft oder besorgt klingt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent message! Our enforcers have arrested a dangerous saboteur who attempted to gain entry onto the bridge. This incident... may be worthy of your attention. You see, both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}You cannot tell if Vigdis sounds baffled or worried.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, eine dringende Nachricht! Unsere Enforcers haben einen gefährlichen Saboteur verhaftet, der versucht hat, sich Zugang zur Brücke zu verschaffen. Dieser Zwischenfall ... ist Eurer Aufmerksamkeit womöglich würdig. Ihr müsst wissen: Der Saboteur als auch die Umstände seiner Gefangennahme wirken ziemlich sonderbar." {n}Du weißt nicht, ob Vigdis verblüfft oder besorgt klingt.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, mensaje urgente! El personal de seguridad ha arrestado a un peligroso saboteador que intentaba entrar en el puente. El incidente... podría merecer su atención. Verá, tanto el saboteador como las circunstancias del arresto han sido un tanto extraños». {n}No sabes si Vigdis está preocupada o perpleja.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent message! Our enforcers have arrested a dangerous saboteur who attempted to gain entry onto the bridge. This incident... may be worthy of your attention. You see, both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}You cannot tell if Vigdis sounds baffled or worried.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, mensaje urgente! El personal de seguridad ha arrestado a un peligroso saboteador que intentaba entrar en el puente. El incidente... podría merecer su atención. Verá, tanto el saboteador como las circunstancias del arresto han sido un tanto extraños». {n}No sabes si Vigdis está preocupada o perpleja.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、緊急連絡です！エンフォーサーが、ブリッジへの侵入を試んでいた危険な破壊工作員を逮捕しました。この事件は…気を付けた方がいいです。破壊工作員も、逮捕の状況も、かなり奇妙なのです」{n}あなたは、ヴィグディスが困惑しているのか、心配しているのかが分からない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent message! Our enforcers have arrested a dangerous saboteur who attempted to gain entry onto the bridge. This incident... may be worthy of your attention. You see, both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}You cannot tell if Vigdis sounds baffled or worried.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、緊急連絡です！エンフォーサーが、ブリッジへの侵入を試んでいた危険な破壊工作員を逮捕しました。この事件は…気を付けた方がいいです。破壊工作員も、逮捕の状況も、かなり奇妙なのです」{n}あなたは、ヴィグディスが困惑しているのか、心配しているのかが分からない。{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, önemli bir mesajım var! Köprüye sızmaya çalışan tehlikeli bir sabotajcı, infazcılarımız tarafından tutuklandı. Bu hadise... dikkatinize değer olabilir. Öyle ki hem bu sabotajcının kendisi hem de tutuklanma süreci hayli tuhaf." {n}Vigdis'in şaşkın mı yoksa endişeli mi olduğunu kestiremiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, an urgent message! Our enforcers have arrested a dangerous saboteur who attempted to gain entry onto the bridge. This incident... may be worthy of your attention. You see, both the saboteur and the circumstances of his capture are rather strange." {n}You cannot tell if Vigdis sounds baffled or worried.{/n}
